mapper.insert:
insert into TodayDiseaseHistory( basic_id, zu_chang, zao_chang, liu_chang, cu_chang, yunzhou, lmp, edc, fu_tong, fu_jxtime, fu_cxtime, blood, bloodvom, water, watervom, jianhong, zhui_zhang, zaoqibushi, bushi_time, taidongtime, gonggao, fuwei, earlybaotai, baotai_drag, virusinfection, torch, fangshe, shijdid, youhaiwuzhi, yhshijdid, jianka, tangshai, cuoshi, chaosheng, yichang, xueya, gxycs, xuetang, gxtcs, abobloodtype, rhbloodtype, gongsuo, taidong
) values( #{basic_id}, #{zu_chang}, #{zao_chang}, #{liu_chang}, #{cu_chang}, #{yunzhou}, #{lmp}, #{edc}, #{fu_tong}, #{fu_jxtime}, #{fu_cxtime}, #{blood}, #{bloodvom}, #{water}, #{watervom}, #{jianhong}, #{zhui_zhang}, #{zaoqibushi}, #{bushi_time}, #{taidongtime}, #{gonggao}, #{fuwei}, #{earlybaotai}, #{baotai_drag}, #{virusinfection}, #{torch}, #{fangshe}, #{shijdid}, #{youhaiwuzhi}, #{yhshijdid}, #{jianka}, #{tangshai}, #{cuoshi}, #{chaosheng}, #{yichang}, #{xueya}, #{gxycs}, #{xuetang}, #{gxtcs}, #{abobloodtype}, #{rhbloodtype}, #{gongsuo}, #{taidong} )
